Accounts Receivable Credit Associate Frito Lay Canada June 2010  –  December 2010  (7 months) Ontario, Canada Assumed ownership of Loblaw Companies Limited accounts nationwide, including: 
- Acting as the primary mandate for managing various aspects in credit to the customer and the collection 
- Monitoring customer accounts on a daily basis in order to meet the target, providing information to the customer concerning account status, invoices and payments, performing necessary follow-up regarding outstanding invoices 
- Preparing and posting clean-up or write-off entries to settle issues and post-audit claims from the customer 
- Maintaining new store setup, store flip and store closure 
- Identifying and resolving various issues related to invoices, to payments/deductions, and to customer accounts 
- Building relationships based on mutual trust with both external and internal customers (including Sales, Key Account Manager, Accounts Receivables and Sales Audit) 
- Performing all clerical duties in connection with the management of credit, such as mailing, filing and record safekeeping
